title: Technical Product Owner
description:
The company is seeking a Technical Product Owner on our Platform integrations team. Working with the Product & Delivery Management Teams, the Product Owner will be responsible for the tactical aspects of the roadmap and strategic planning of our platform product integrations. Your work will
focus primarily on the product functionality we build alongside our 3rd party vendors– you’ll be uncovering client, both internal and external, needs, accurately scoping effort, creating robust documentation, developing product delivery goals, and actively managing the product roadmap.

Think of yourself as the glue that ties together the company´s architecture and integration platform: working with all the different parts of our organization to help us launch new products & integrations and evolve our existing ones so our clients can continue defining the cutting edge of banking,
including account opening & lending.

If you are right for the position, you are…

-Highly determined and driven to achieve results with a clear track record of doing so
-You approach business opportunities with an unwavering sense of optimism that brings positive energy to everyone they work with
-Scrappy; quick to find the best path to a goal by collaborating with others
-An intuitive problem solver comfortable operating in ambiguity
-Detail-oriented with an eye for data analysis
-An effective communicator that can align internal and external stakeholders & build and influence cross-departmental work groups


RESPONSIBILITIES:  

-Align with Product & Engineering leadership to plan and prioritize product feature backlog and development for the product
-Define product functionality and write detailed User Stories/Epics with empathy for the end user that help engineers build with a clear end goal in mind
-Work with the team to define each sprint plan, review completed work, and accept/reject results. This person is highly available to the team
-Apply Agile methods and processes to promote a disciplined software development process that encourages frequent inspection and adaptation of ongoing work product
-Articulate product vision and user stories in a manner clearly understandable to development teams and clients
-Deliver product acceptance testing protocol for the development organization you work with to ensure the highest quality and internal & external customer experience
-Responsible for the delivery of Objectives and Key Results

Requirements

-Typically requires a bachelor’s degree and a minimum of 3 years of related experience; or an advanced degree with 3+ years of experience; or equivalent related work experience.
-3 to 5 years in Product Management, financial services, or e commerce is preferred 
-Technical background familiar with backend integrations, APIs, working with & building relationships with 3rd party vendors to create scalable solutions.
-Experience with Agile Scrum methodology
-Well versed in process management, demonstrated ability to manage complex rollouts with multiple stakeholders – has launched products at scale
-Self-starter with proven ability to deliver results with minimal assistance is a must 
-Knowledge of software product development lifecycle, understanding of product design, dependencies, and tradeoffs 
-Ability to break down high-level features into tactical user stories and assign and track them across multiple organizations 
-Outstanding problem solving and analytical abilities 
-Excellent verbal, written, interpersonal, organization, and presentation skills 
-Strong familiarity with Atlassian Suite (Jira, Confluence, etc.)
-Comfortable working with remote Business/Leadership/Engineering teams 
-Desire to work with highly scalable enterprise software

title: Software Engineer
description:
The company is seeking an experienced C# .NET/Golang Backend Engineer on our Platform Integration team at the company, you will help enhance company online banking software and extend its capabilities with new and existing 3rd party integrations.  You will design, develop, debug and deploy applications and services using C# and the .NET Framework along with Golang
via Docker containers in Nomad.  Projects are relatively small with short, aggressive timelines, which creates a dynamic and constantly changing atmosphere. As part of our Engineering group based in Austin, TX, you will be working individually and collaboratively to develop, implement, and support custom solutions through fast-paced, dynamic projects
involving the integration layer of the company platform to extend its functionality to meet our clients’ unique needs.  Our ideal candidate is someone with a self-motivated tinkering spirit and who is comfortable diving into professional development life while rapidly learning to engineer
solutions using a mix of open technologies and our own proprietary framework. 


RESPONSIBILITIES:
-Design, implement, integrate, and test solutions of moderate complexity comprised of .Net C#/Core or Golang applications running on Windows and Linux.
-Work with HashiCorp tool chain
-Work in simi-agile team with Atlassian tools
-Work individually and collaboratively to deliver solutions in live production systems.
-Support, maintain, and resolve problems for product features in live production
systems, with occasional on-call availability.
-Responsible for ensuring that all security, availability, confidentiality and privacy policies and controls are adhered to.
-Assist and mentor teammates to provide technical leadership and evangelize best practices.

Requirements

EXPERIENCE AND KNOWLEDGE:

-Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science and a minimum of 5 years of related
experience; or an advanced degree with 3+ years of experience; or equivalent
related work experience developing on the backend stack. 
-developing on the backend stack. 
-Experience with Golang (desired not required)
-Experience with HasiCorp (desired not required)
-Experience with developing Client/Server applications that may utilize:
-Web Service integration (SOAP, XML, Rest)
-Authentication integration (SAML, OAuth)
-Experience developing multi-threaded applications with an understanding of
concepts such as threads, concurrency and locking.
-Experience engineering software in a service-oriented architecture
-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
-Effective communication skills
-Experience contributing in an Agile development environment
-Good interpersonal skills
-Availability for on-call/emergency support
-Ability to work flexible hours when necessary for deadlines and off-hours
installations.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
The DevOps/Platform Engineer reports to the The Manager of DevOps and Platform Engineering and will collaborate with a team of Dev/Sec/Ops engineers. This position will have a direct impact on production operations for a large multi-site Linux infrastructure providing internet security solutions for domestic and international markets.

As a DevOps/Platform Engineer you will work closely with the members of your team and members of the Software Engineering and Network Engineering teams to build, manage and maintain a suite of online security products. We've established a strong foundation to make us the undisputed leader in our space. Now we need to add experienced, collaborative, and passionate DevOps engineers to help us grow, support, and maintain our services for our customers.

Job Duties:
  • Contribute to all phases of the deployment and operations lifecycles for all of our services and applications.
  • Collaborate with team members and other stakeholders to build, expand, migrate, and improve our platforms.
  • Research and incorporate industry and company best practices in your work.
  • Develop and deploy new infrastructure to facilitate related procedures and tools if necessary.
  • Establish, maintain, and create documentation for our systems.
  • Collaborate with scoping, design and planning of initiatives.
  • Participate in peer review and code review sessions to ensure quality and/or to learn and teach each other.
  • Create and maintain CI/CD pipelines, including maintaining and creating Docker images, helm charts, and other deployment recipes and scripts.
  • Create or maintain new cloud infrastructure, with a focus on repeatability, security, and reliability.
  • Investigate platform operational issues and anomalies, and participate in the resolution and remediation and followup thereof.

Requirements

  • At least 5 years of experience with Linux.
  • At least 3 years experience in a role with Devops duties.
  • Experience with AWS as both a generic compute platform and some of its hosted services, such as Route53, Lamda, RDS, API Gateway, Cognito, EKS, Amazon Elasticsearch; and supporting infrastructure as code tools like Terraform.
  • Proficient with scripting languages such as Bash and Perl or Python.
  • Proficient with containers, including Docker, docker-compose, kubernetes, helm.
  • Experience with systems automation and configuration management tools.
  • Experience with RDBMS systems such as Postgres, MySQL, including replication and high availability.
  • Hands-on experience with CI/CD systems such as Gitlab or Github Actions.
  • Experience with change management policies and procedures.
  • Proven written and verbal communication skills in English.
  • You are service-oriented and enjoy working with a team to manage, deploy and tune high volume applications in a cloud environment.
  • You are motivated and keep on top of current technical trends along with deep knowledge of your tools of choice.
  • You are reliable, and we can count on you in times of need.
  • Candidates should be able to demonstrate strong problem-solving methodology and the ability to work with individuals at all levels of the organization as well as external vendors.

Desirables

  • Experience with metrics and monitoring tools such as Prometheus, Grafana, InfluxDB, and Nagios.
  • Experience with administration of or usage of Elasticsearch, Logstash and Kibana.
  • Experience integrating and maintaining SaaS metrics and analytics platforms (such as Newrelic or Datadog).

Benefits

  • Private Medical Insurance- 100% employer paid.
  • Aguinaldo
  • PTU’s
  • Employee Stock Purchase Plan
  • Paid Time Off
    • Vacation: 15 days per year accrued
    • Holidays: 9 Holidays
    • Bereavement: 80 hours for inmidiate family.
    • Pregnancy Leave 
    • Parental Leave

title: BackEnd Engineer, API Integrations
description:
The engineers will be working on creating and maintaining Company's integrations.

A Company integration is how Company connects to our partner APIs (think Facebook, Gmail, Asana), allowing our users to automate their tasks.

The developers will work on a select subset of integrations and cover work such as
- Bug fixes
- API deprecations, updating our integrations to the latest version of APIs offered by our partners
- Integration improvements, adding new functionality to existing integrations
- New integrations, creating new integrations as requested by our partnerships group

The work will happen via our CLI integration platform.

Requirements

Working with a team:
  • Must - Communication (writes well, speaks well, good video)
  • Must - Experience with pull requests
  • Must - Experience working remotely
  • Must - Experience writing documentation
  • Experience working with a product manager
  • Experience with Kanban or Scrum
Desired experience around building things (code/tools):
  • Must - Experienced on our stack (Javascript, Node JS, Node JS testing framework including nock)
  • Must - Experience testing (unit, integration, load, system, usability, accessibility)
  • Must - Experience with Packaging - npm, containers, container registry
  • Must - Experience with Debugging
  • Must - Experience with APIs and REST principles
  • Must - Experience with oAuth 2.0
  • Must - Experience with Git and GitLab
  • Must - Experience with security (PCI top 10, Static Testing, Secret Detection)
  • Must - Experience with Asynchronous patterns
  • Experience with software patterns (Factory, singleton, decorator, facade, etc)
  • Experience with parallelism/concurrency
  • Experience with Functional paradigms
  • Experience with performance optimization

Desired experience around DevOps (production readiness):
  • Must - Experience with monitoring tools (new relic, data dog)
  • Experience with continuous integration
  • Experience with configuration managers
  • Experience with distributed tracing (debugging on distributed systems)
  • Experience releasing software to a cloud environment (Continuous delivery, release orchestration, incremental rollouts, canary, feature flags, A/B deployments, etc.)
  • Experience defending live systems (threat detection, strategies to mitigate attacks)
  • Experience making systems performant (CDN, distributed caching, parallel processing)

Benefits

  • Seguro de Gastos Médicos Mayores
  • 10 de vacaciones
  • Días festivos US o MX 
  • Bonos Trimestrales
  • Apoyo para internet
  • Programa de Bienestar

title: Scrum Master Int
description:
Founded in 1994, the company is an internationally-awarded, integrated, independent digital  advertising agency that believes smart thinking equals endless possibilities. The company is headquartered in Beijing and Los Angeles, with offices located across London, New York, Paris, Munich, Shanghai, and Bogota. Hylink’s work is known for being deeply rooted in technological evolution and innovation. Renowned for repeatedly pushing advertising benchmarks, we constantly strive for digital innovation.
The company is a leader in working with industries of all shapes and sizes. Over the past two decades, we have grown to a team of 2,600 digitally minded-professionals worldwide, earning ourr eputation as the Home of Integrated Marketing. A consistent Effie, Campaign, The Drum, Shorty, Webby, and Cannes winner, our work values the best inter-disciplinary thinkers and
doers in advertising. Our objective for you is simple: Do the best work of your life.

Responsibilities:
● Manage and optimize the flow of value through the Agile product release cycle using tools, such as Jira in scrum or Kanban models.
● Support your product line’s strategy and roadmap, aligning it with company priorities and goals
● Support the product strategy, rooted in a progressively deeper understanding of the market, customer needs and product positioning among competitors
● Ensure the successful execution of product roadmaps, driving quick, iterative cycles of delivering products and features
● Collaborate cross-functionally with engineers and designers to build an extraordinary product, marketing and sales to launch new platform, and client operations to deliver best-in-class client experience
● Validate and de-risk product innovation ideas
● Define, track, and improve key product metrics to maximize performance, adoption, and market growth
● Exhibit Agile leadership, helping to reinforce and help the team embrace Agile Core Values and implement Agile practices

Requirements

Qualifications:
● Scrum Master Certification
● Must have experience in facilitating and supporting all scrum events: Sprint Planning, Daily Scrum, Sprint Review, and Sprint Perspective
● 5+ years of product experience building products, enterprise SaaS experience would be an asset
● Ability to drive initiatives ahead while aligning cross-functionally
● You can and have managed stakeholder relationships to drive alignment
● Keen product sense and UX design experience, with a desire to discover and fulfill the needs of users
● Experience collaborating with designers, developers, marketers, and customers in an agile environment
● A growth mindset that embraces challenges, persists in the face of setbacks, learns from feedback, and is inspired by the success of others
● Ability to navigate ambiguity; comfort with 360-degree ownership of the product
● Goal-driven, independent and a self-starter; you've never given someone a reason to micromanage you
● Goal-driven, independent and a self-starter; you've never given someone a reason to micromanage you

title: Product Manager
description:
• Strong finance and accounting background with deep experience in Record to Report (R2R) process in Hi-Tech /Technology /Software /SaaS companies. 

  • Create or update end-user training documents and guides.

  • Provide hands-on training to end users on various aspects of applications.

  • Resolving product issues by opening, updating, and escalating service tickets with product vendors.

  • Ability to work on on-site offshore model. Need to Coordinate and guide offshore team for faster issue resolution

  • Managed end-to-end program management from proposal through solution delivery, business adoption, and post-implementation support using agile / sprint framework.

  • Well versed with tools/systems / processes to compliance with various regulations and governance such as SOX, ASC 606, IFRS15, etc.

  • Self-starter, motivated, organized and company-first mentality.

  • Good listener, Willing to learn new things, and thrive in a fast-paced team environment.



Requirements

  • Bachelor's degree in Accounting or Finance, or Engineering with 6+ years of experience in business systems and analytics
  • Detail-oriented yet to see the big picture
  • Hands-on Experience in leading SaaS/Cloud solutions in Sales Commissions such as Xactly, Adaptive Insights, etc. 
  • Hands-on Experience in leading SaaS/ Cloud solutions in Finance, accounting, Tax, R2R and O2C, and Revenue Management such as NetSuite, Netsuite ARM/ Rev Sym/RevPro, etc.​
  • Prior experience as a Financial Business Systems Analyst
  • NetSuite Certification a Plus
  • Experience of working on Netsuite ARM module will be a huge plus


Benefits

  • SGMM (candidate + family)
  • 10 days PTO + US or MX Holidays
  • Quarterly performance bonuses
  • 500 MXN Internet stipend 
  • Wellness Program

title: Online Support
description:
Company is a social food app that makes ordering food more convenient, affordable, and social! Company is based in the USA and supports restaurants all over the country. As a member of the customer support team, you would connect with restaurants and users daily to assist them.

Many of our partner restaurant owners speak english as their second language. The candidate needs to have a strong enough grasp of english to assist customers who have strong accents over the phone. 



Requirements

Experience with live chat support, phone support, assisting customers over the phone, and troubleshooting tech issues  Comfortable working independently in a fast paced role, able to handle shifting priorities and stay calm when putting out fires.  Team player, patient, enjoys problem solving & helping people  This person will also do menus.

Benefits

- Bono Mensual
- Aguinaldo

title: Software Engineer in Test
description:
The QA Automation Engineer is responsible for the quality of software development and deployment.

The QA Automation Engineer is involved in the development, execution and maintenance of automated tests to ensure the software created by developers is fit for purpose.

Principal tasks

• Works within established standards within the QA organization
• Ensure high quality software is delivered in each release
• Advance and maintain the test automation framework
• Research and resolve any broken automation scripts that fail during execution
• Develop new automation scripts
• Support manual QA testing efforts in conversion of manual test cases into automated ones
• Update test results in test tracking tool(s)
• Report, track, and manage any discovered defects to resolution
• Work effectively and collaboratively with other members on the product team
• Mentor junior members of the test automation team

Requirements

  • 2+ years of test automation experience in web/cloud services, applications, and platforms
  • Experienced with writing and executing detailed test cases, test plans and test design documents
  • Experienced with application (UI/API/Unit) automation tools, BDD automation tools, monitoring tools, performance testing tools, and automation technologies
  • Experience with writing tests in Ruby, Python, or Perl (Ruby is preferred)
    Hands-on experience with test automation in WATIR or Selenium (WATIR is preferred)
ESSENTIAL SKILLS
  • 2+ years of test automation experience in web/cloud services, applications, and platforms
  • Experience with writing code in Ruby, Python, or Perl


Benefits

  • SGMM (candidate + family)
  • 10 days PTO + US or MX Holidays
  • Quarterly performance bonuses
  • 500 MXN Internet stipend 
  • Wellness Program

title: Java Developer
description:
The Java Developer creates user information solutions by developing, implementing, and maintaining Java based components and interfaces. The Java developer contributes to the entire development lifecycle, writes well designed, testable and efficient code and comprehensive unit tests.

The Java Developer has hands-on experience in software development and uses the expertise and knowledge of the industry practices to perform software development tasks using Java-based technologies.

Principal tasks:
​
• Design and develop high-volume, low-latency applications that enhance the Agiloft core platform
• Create well designed, testable, efficient code
• Participate in all phases of the development lifecycle
• Assist in preparation and production of releases
• Ensure designs meet specifications
• Investigate alternatives and technologies and present them for architectural review, in order to support continuous improvement



Requirements

  • Experience with J2EE, Tomcat, JBoss and relational databases such as MySQL, MSSQL, Oracle
  • Experience working on large projects
  • At least two years of post-graduate experience
  • Deep understanding of OO programming principals and commitment to clean, efficient, well documented code.
  • Professional experience with EJB.
  • Self-motivated, can work in remote teams

ESSENTIAL SKILLS

  • Multiple years of hands-on experience developing enterprise applications in Java with J2EE, JBoss and relational databases.


Benefits

  • SGMM (candidate + family)
  • 10 days PTO + US or MX Holidays
  • Quarterly performance bonuses
  • 500 MXN Internet stipend 
  • Wellness Program

title: BackEnd Software Engineer
description:
• Developing a platform that simplifies the process of shipping large assets
  • Create intuitive tools for getting shipping information and pricing
  • Developing complex formulas from business logic
  • Work with the product owner to determine project specifications
  • Write, QA, and ship code to production
  • Review fellow team member's work through code review
  • Document processes


Requirements

Required Experience:
  • 5 years experience with PHP
  • 2 years experience with Laravel
  • 2 years experience with SQL
Preferred Experience:
  • 1 year of experience with full-stack development working with Javascript


Benefits

  • Seguro de Gastos Médicos Mayores
